description:
Middle-school student Aotsuki Ushio lives with his temple master father, Shigure. One day, as Ushio is cleaning around the house, he finds something unspeakable in the basement.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die schicksalhafte Begegnung von Ushio und Tora
La rencontre fatidique entre Ushio et Tora
The Fate That Brings Ushio and Tora Together
Ushio Tora to Deau no En
うしおとらとであうの縁
